title:
Mary McLeod Bethune Council House National Historic Site
: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit         The Mary McLeod Bethune Council House National Historic Site. NPS  The Mary McLeod Bethune Council House National Historic Site has much to offer visitors. From tours of the historic Council House, to special programs about the history of women's rights and civil rights in America.  Basic Information Directions & Transportation Things To Do Calendar Safety Accessibility Nearby Attractions For youth and student specific offerings please visit our For Teachers and For Kids pages. *Please note: On-street parking is limited. We strongly suggest you use public transportation. Visit our Directions page for more information.  Â    Scholars wishing to conduct research in the National Archives for Black Women's History should visit our Archives page for more information.
